sentence: Cheney is up for reelection this November but will first have to face off against Trump-backed Harriet Hageman in the GOP primary.
author: Mychael Schnell
title: RNC to debate Trump ally's resolution to expel Cheney, Kinzinger: report

sentence: Cheney faces Trump-endorsed challenger Harriet Hageman in an August primary this year, though she continues to break personal fundraising records.
author: Emily Brooks
title: Push to oust Cheney and Kinzinger from GOP simmers in Congress as RNC debates it

sentence: As Breitbart News reported in January, a Wyoming straw poll has Cheney losing to the Trump-backed Harriet Hageman.
author: Paul Bois
title: Republican National Committee Will Vote Friday to Censure Liz Cheney, Adam Kinzinger

sentence: The Washington Post reports that the Wyoming GOP has signed onto a letter allowing the national party to fund the campaign of Cheney's Trump-backed primary challenger Harriet Hageman.
author: Ryan Bort
title: The Award for Political Euphemism of the Year Has Already Been Won

sentence: The Post also reported that GOP officials in Wyoming struck a deal with the national party to financially support Harriet Hageman, a former RNC committeewoman who's been endorsed by Trump, in her primary against Cheney this year.
author: Bryan Metzger
title: RNC Chairwoman Ronna McDaniel says January 6 committee is a 'Democrat-led persecution of ordinary citizens who engaged in legitimate political discourse'

sentence: Perhaps even more significantly, leaders of the Wyoming Republican Party signed a letter calling Cheney's primary challenger, Harriet Hageman, the presumptive nominee for the seat Cheney is running to retain.
author: Laura Clawson
title: Plan to censure Cheney and Kinzinger suggests Republicans are nervous about the Jan. 6 committee

sentence: House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy (R-CA) will host a fundraiser next week for Rep. Liz Cheney's (R-WY) opponent, Harriet Hageman.
author: Wendell HusebÃ¸
title: Kevin McCarthy to Host Huge Fundraiser for Liz Cheney's Opponent, Harriet Hageman
